channel.title: ~~ Blitz Pkz ~~ 317 ~~ PI ~~ Dungeoneering ~~ Full Primal ~~ Korasi Sword ~~ VB
channel.description:
[center][center][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100307130901/runescape/images/0/0a/Bow_emote_icon.PNG[/img][img]http://imgur.com/DHXUh.png[/img][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100307130901/runescape/images/0/0a/Bow_emote_icon.PNG[/img][/center]
[center]Welcome to Blitz Pkz development team, please don't flame or hate ;) let's continue to the latest updates & features[/center]
[center][img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100215200526/runescape/images/e/e3/Skillcape_E.png[/img][img]http://imgur.com/RVzsD.png[/img][img]http://images1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100215200526/runescape/images/e/e3/Skillcape_E.png[/img][/center] [center] [ul][b]SERVER[/b] [list][li]100% soulsplit[/li] [li]Pick Private Messaging Color[/li] [li]100% working Clan chat with Lootshare[/li] [li]100% custom dungeoneering system[/li] [li]PVP & PK working 100%[/li] [li]Stable Combat System[/li] [li]Fixed Memory Leaks[/li] [li]World Map can be opened by clicking the world map button on client[/li] [li]HP, Prayer & Run orbs working 100%[/li] [li]Donator Benefits[/li] [li]Area Clipper[/li] [li]Turmoil 100% working[/li] [li]602 anim for whip and others[/li] [li]Slayer System[/li] [li]PVP Point Shop[/li] [li]100% Godsword Stance[/li] [li]Special attacks 100%[/li] [li]Sexy Game Frame[/li] [li]Few Custom Items[/li] [li]Bank Pin System[/li] [li]Black Mark System[/li] [li]All skills working 100%[/li] [li]Correct Dragon Claws Formula[/li] [li]Chaotic Items[/li] [li]Clue Scroll[/li] [li]Reciper For Disaster Quest[/li] [li]Few Teleport Interfaces[/li] [li]Face North[/li] [li]Critical Hits[/li] [li]5 Quests[/li] [li]100% Special Bar[/li] [li]Fixed Clan Chat[/li] [li]Fixed Pk Points System[/li] [li]PVP is working 100%[/li] [li]Dungeoneering Bugs Fixed[/li] [li]Added/Deleted some items in shops[/li] [/list][/center]
[center][list] [b]Forums/Website[/b] [list][li]Vbulletin Forums (Im improving the forums but you can register on it and see the forums)[/li] [li]Webhost (With Mysql and PHP)[/li] [li]MORE COMING SOON[/li] [/list][/center]
[center][u][b]~~ What are my Goals ~~[/b][/u] 500+ Players with no lagg Stable Server Good Community Friendly Players[/center]
[center][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100307132009/runescape/images/1/11/P_Bow.png[/img][img]http://imgur.com/gYrH3.png[/img][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100307132009/runescape/images/1/11/P_Bow.png[/img][/center] [img]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/1017/2hell5l.png[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/uKe9oS.png[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/3pAric.png[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/eS4TCH.png[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/FA3qjy.png[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/0orzCV.png[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/dIQ2cr.png[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/5V3i3L.png[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/YFyqWm.png[/img] [img]http://screensnapr.com/-/uploads/pXYfB3.png[/img]
[b]Server Coders[/b] ---- [4/5] ---- (Lancer) (Blessed) (Alan) (Mozie) ( ) [b]Client Coders[/b] ---- [2/5] ---- (Lancer) (Matt ) ( ) ( ) ( ) [b]Website Coder/Designer[/b] ---- [5/5] ---- (Lancer) (Paul) (Duy Kim) (Joseph246) (Trevor) [b]Forums Coder/Designer (VB)[/b] ---- [5/5] ---- (Lancer) (Paul) (Duy Kim) (Joseph246) (Trevor) [b]GFX Designer[/b] ---------------------- [1/3] ---- (Nano) ( ) ( ) ( ) [b][/b]
[b]~~Format for applying to Blitz Pkz development Team~~[/b] [/list][/ul] [code]Name: Age: Experience: Why do you want this job: How much time are you dedicated to us: Will you follow the rules: Do you know RSPS: MSN (Optional): Skype (Optional):[/code][/center]
[font=arial][size=18pt][u][b]Credits:[/b][/u][/size][/font] [size=15pt]Rash - 10% (Welcome, Latest Updates & Media Graphics) Encrypted - 15% (Source & Client ~ Coded new things ) Overloadx - 25% (Original Source & Client) Lancer [ME] - 50% (Fixed alot of errors, added new features, fixed bugs, fixed teleporting bugs, clipped areas, fixed client errors, fixed mem leaks) Moparscape - 5% (I can't post this if there's no Moparscape :P thanks moparscape ! [/size]

item.dc:creator: @mr_pker01 mr pker01
item.description:
@mr_pker01 wrote:

[quote=“2bel, post:31, topic:397643”]Name: Duy Kim
Age: 17
Experience: From Oldschool Silab - 317. I’ve been designing many websites for many servers. I have alot of experience on that. I have designed websites for 2-3 years now. Owned one server: Proletscape and was coding website for (Epicurus)
Why do you want this job: I want this job because I know I would be a great employee, and I left Epicurus because I wanted to start fresh.
How much time are you dedicated to us: Well, I dont go to school anymore, weekends: 13 HOURS and 30 minutes maybe. and monday-thursday (6 hours maybe (Work) )
Will you follow the rules: Yes I will
Do you know RSPS: I know it alot. I’ve been coding own my own server with 2 partners.
MSN (Optional): duykim123@live.no
Skype (Optional): duykim1[/quote][quote=“Joseph246, post:32, topic:397643”][font=comic sans ms][size=10pt]Hi, im joining a development team, and this is what i can do, im a forums developer and i work with website making. I have experienced with website making just for 1 year, but i can make really nice forums and sites really good. Can show my work, but not putting links. I am not willing to join a noob team, i want to join a team that takes things seriously. Making forums and site takes me less then an hour to make, to make it perfect and add forum ranks and other things will take a full hour.
[/size][/font]
My name is Steven and im 14 year olds.

I have been making forums for many private servers long time ago and i used t own my own Rsps with 20+ players last year. As im also a rsps coder PI coder, i can code quest tab spawning pretty easy. And change many things into a source. But overall the best thing i can code is a 525 codeusa. I know many people as i am trusted.

Basically im Applying for Website designer/coder.[/quote][quote=“judostar1, post:33, topic:397643”]Name: Trevor
Age:15
Experience: 2 years of rsps playing and about 6 months of admin.
What job will you like: Forum coder/developer.
Why do you want this job: I love coding and helping others on rsps, and I love coding websites.
How much time are you dedicated to us: 4-6 hrs.
Will you follow the rules: YES!!!
Do you know RSPS: HELL YEAH
MSN (Optional):
Skype (Optional):judostar11[/quote]

You three Welcome to the team !!

Add my msn noddyfadera@yahoo.com

*WEBSITE & FORUMS CODER/DEVELOPER IS NOW FULL.

Read full topic
